comments.html: It's so refreshing to hear someone call switching a marketing term. I'm surrounded by people who don't know the actual difference between switching and bridging. I know at least one person who defines firewalls as a layer 3 device and IP forwarding in switches as a layer 2+ function. It isn't layer 3 unless the device has packet filtering apparently...even though that often uses layer 4 information. sigh
comments.name: Scoopta
